column4: i have two different sized monitors connected via DVI and they work fine. is it possible to assign one virtual desktop (not xserver) to each of the monitors?

easy way is to disable twinview in Nvidia-setting prior to starting the game.  Hard way is you can edit your Xorg and create a NULL output for a certain resolution that will auto-disable one monitor when a particular resolution is requested (nvidia-settings doesn't really seem to like you doing this, and starts complaining when you load it up)
